<section_title_end> </s> the year <number> marked the date when the ruling prince ( fejedelem ) gza , grand prince of the hungarian of the rpd dynasty officially started to integrate hungary into the christian western europe . his first-born son , stephen i of hungary , became the first king of hungary after defeating his paganism uncle koppny , who also claimed the throne . under stephen , hungary wa recognised a a catholic apostolic kingdom . applying to pope sylvester ii , stephen received the insignia of royalty ( including probably a part of the holy crown of hungary , currently kept in the hungarian parliament building ) from the papacy . </s> by <year> , stephen consolidated his power , and started sweeping reform to convert hungary into a western feudalism . the country switched to using the latin language , and until a late a <year> , latin remained the official language of hungary . around this time , hungary began to become a powerful kingdom . ladislaus i of hungary extended hungary 's frontier in transylvania and invaded kingdom of croatia ( medieval ) in <year> . the croatian campaign culminated in the battle of gvozd mountain in <year> and a croatia in personal union with hungary in <year> , ruled by coloman of hungary i.e . knyves klmn . </s> the most powerful and wealthiest king of the rpd dynasty wa bla iii of hungary , who disposed of the equivalent of <number> tonne of pure silver a year . this exceeded the income of the french king ( estimated at <number> tonne ) and wa double the receipt of the english crown . </s> andrew ii of hungary issued the diploma andreanum which secured the special privilege of the transylvanian saxon and is considered the first autonomy law in the world . he led the fifth crusade to the holy land in <year> , setting up the largest royal army in the history of crusade . his golden bull of <year> wa the first constitution in continental europe . the lesser noble also began to present andrew with grievance , a practice that evolved into the institution of the parliament ( parlamentum publicum ) . </s> in <year> <number> , the kingdom received a major blow with the mongolian invasion of hungary mongol ( tatar ) invasion . up to half of hungary 's then population of <number> were victim of the invasion . king bla iv let cumans and jassic people into the country , who were fleeing the mongol . over the century , they were fully assimilated into the hungarian population . </s> a a consequence , after the mongol retreated , king bla ordered the construction of hundred of stone castle and fortification , to defend against a possible second mongol invasion . the second mongol invasion of hungary in <year> , but the newly built stone-castle system and new tactic ( using a higher proportion of heavily armed knight ) stopped them . the invading mongol force wa defeated near pest by the royal army of ladislaus iv of hungary . a with later invasion , it wa repelled handily , the mongol losing much of their invading force . </s> <section_title_start> age of elected king <section_title_end> </s> the kingdom of hungary reached one of it greatest extent during the rpdian king , yet royal power wa weakened at the end of their rule in <year> . after a destructive period of interregnum ( <year> <number> ) , the first capetian house of anjou king , charles i of hungary a bilineal descendant of the rpd dynasty successfully restored royal power , and defeated oligarch rival , the so-called `` little king `` . the second angevin hungarian king , louis i of hungary ( <year> <number> ) , led many successful military campaign from lithuania to southern italy ( kingdom of naples ) , and wa also king of poland from <year> . after king louis died without a male heir , the country wa stabilized only when sigismund , holy roman emperor ( <year> <number> ) succeeded to the throne , who in <year> also became holy roman emperor . sigismund wa also ( in several way ) a bilineal descendant of the rpd dynasty . </s> the first hungarian bible translation wa completed in <year> . for half a year in <year> , there wa an antifeudal and anticlerical peasant revolt in transylvania , the budai nagy antal revolt , which wa strongly influenced by hussite idea . </s> from a small noble family in transylvania , john hunyadi grew to become one of the country 's most powerful lord , thanks to his outstanding capability a a mercenary commander . he wa elected governor then regent . he wa a successful crusader against the ottoman turk , one of his greatest victory being the siege of belgrade ( <year> ) in <year> . </s> the last strong king of medieval hungary wa the renaissance king matthias corvinus ( <year> <number> ) , son of john hunyadi . his election wa the first time that a member of the nobility mounted to the hungarian royal throne without dynastic background . he wa a successful military leader and an enlightened patron of the art and learning . his library , the bibliotheca corviniana , wa europe 's greatest collection of historical chronicle , philosophic and scientific work in the <number> century , and second only in size to the vatican library . item from the bibliotheca corviniana were inscribed on unesco 's memory of the world register in <year> . </s> the serf and common people considered him a just ruler because he protected them from excessive demand from and other abuse by the magnate . under his rule , in <year> , the hungarian army destroyed the ottoman and wallachian troop at the battle of breadfield . abroad he defeated the polish and german imperial army of frederick at breslau ( wrocaw ) . matthias ' mercenary standing army , the black army of hungary , wa an unusually large army for it time , and it conquered part of austria , vienna ( <year> ) and part of bohemia . </s> <section_title_start> decline of hungary ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> king matthias died without lawful son , and the hungarian magnate procured the accession of the pole vladislaus ii of bohemia and hungary ( <year> <number> ) , supposedly because of his weak influence on hungarian aristocracy . hungary 's international role declined , it political stability shaken , and social progress wa deadlocked . in <year> , the weakened old king vladislaus ii faced a major peasant rebellion led by gyrgy dzsa , which wa ruthlessly crushed by the nobility in the kingdom of hungary , led by john zpolya . </s> the resulting degradation of order paved the way for ottoman pre-eminence . in <year> , the strongest hungarian fortress in the south , nndorfehrvr ( today 's belgrade , serbia ) , siege of belgrade ( <year> ) . the early appearance of protestantism further worsened internal relation in the country . </s> <section_title_start> ottoman war ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> after some ottoman war in europe with the hungarian and other state , the ottoman gained a decisive victory over the hungarian army at the battle of mohcs in <year> , where louis ii of hungary died while fleeing . amid political chaos , the divided nobility in the kingdom of hungary elected two king simultaneously , john zpolya and ferdinand i , holy roman emperor of the habsburg dynasty . with the conquest of buda by the turk in <year> , hungary wa divided into three part and remained so until the end of the <number> century . the north-western part , termed a royal hungary , wa annexed by the habsburg who ruled a king of hungary . the eastern part of the kingdom became independent a the principality of transylvania ( <year> <number> ) , under ottoman ( and later habsburg ) suzerainty . the remaining central area , including the capital buda , wa known a the ottoman hungary . </s> the vast majority of the seventeen and nineteen thousand ottoman soldier in service in the ottoman fortress in the territory of hungary were orthodox and muslim balkan slav rather than ethnic turkish people . orthodox southern slav were also acting a akinjis and other light troop intended for pillaging in the territory of present-day hungary . in <year> , the holy league ( <year> ) holy league 's army , containing over <number> men from various nation , battle of buda ( <year> ) from the turk . after some more crushing austro-turkish war of <year> <number> in the next few year , the entire kingdom of hungary wa removed from ottoman rule by <year> . the last raid into hungary by the ottoman vassal crimean khanate from crimea took place in <year> . the constrained habsburg counter-reformation effort in the <number> century reconverted the majority of the kingdom to catholicism . the ethnic composition of hungary wa fundamentally changed a a consequence of the prolonged warfare with the turk . a large part of the country became devastated , population growth wa stunted , and many smaller settlement perished . the austrian-habsburg government settled large group of serb and other slav in the depopulated south , and settled german of hungary ( called danube swabians ) in various area , but hungarian were not allowed to settle or re-settle in the south of the pannonian plain . </s> <section_title_start> from the <number> century to world war i ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> between <year> and <year> , there wa a large-scale uprising led by francis ii rkczi , who after the dethronement of the habsburg in <year> at the diet of nod , took power provisionally a the ruling prince of hungary for the wartime period , but refused the hungarian crown and the title `` king `` . the uprising lasted for year . the hungarian kuruc army , although taking over most of the country , lost the main battle of trencsn ( <year> ) . three year later , because of the growing desertion , defeatism and low morale , the kuruc force finally surrendered . </s> during the napoleonic war and afterwards , the hungarian diet had not convened for decade . in the <year> , the emperor wa forced to convene the diet , which marked the beginning of a reform period ( <year> <number> , reformkor ) . count istvn szchenyi , one of the most prominent statesman of the country , recognised the urgent need of modernisation and his message got through . the hungarian parliament wa reconvened in <year> to handle financial need . a liberal party emerged and focused on providing for the peasantry . lajos kossuth a famous journalist at that time emerged a leader of the lower gentry in the parliament . a remarkable upswing started a the nation concentrated it force on modernisation even though the habsburg monarch obstructed all important liberal law relating to civil and political right and economic reform . many reformer ( lajos kossuth , mihly tncsics ) were imprisoned by the authority . </s> on <number> march <year> , mass demonstration in pest and buda enabled hungarian reformist to push through a list of <number> point of the hungarian revolutionary of <year> . under governor and president lajos kossuth and the first prime minister , lajos batthyny , the house of habsburg wa dethroned . </s> the habsburg ruler and his advisor skilfully manipulated the croatian , serbian and romanian peasantry , led by priest and officer firmly loyal to the habsburg , and induced them to rebel against the hungarian government , though the hungarian were supported by the vast majority of the slovak , german and rusyns nationality and by all the jew of the kingdom , a well a by a large number of polish , austrian and italian volunteer . in july <year> the hungarian parliament proclaimed and enacted the first law of ethnic and minority right in the world . many member of the nationality gained the coveted highest position within the hungarian army , like general jnos damjanich , an ethnic serb who became a hungarian national hero through his command of the <number> hungarian army corp or jzef bem , who wa polish and also became a national hero in hungary . the hungarian force ( royal hungarian landwehr ) defeated austrian army . to counter the success of the hungarian revolutionary army , habsburg emperor franz joseph i asked for help from the `` gendarme of europe `` , tsar nicholas i of russia , whose russian army invaded hungary . this made artr grgey surrender in august <year> . the leader of the austrian army , julius jacob von haynau , became governor of hungary for a few month , and ordered the execution of the <number> martyr of arad , leader of the hungarian army , and prime minister batthyny in october <year> . lajos kossuth escaped into exile . following the war of <year> <number> , the whole country wa in `` passive resistance `` . </s> because of external and internal problem , reform seemed inevitable and major military defeat of austria forced the habsburg to negotiate the austro-hungarian compromise of <year> , by which the dual monarchy of austriahungary wa formed . this empire had the second largest area in europe ( after the russian empire ) , and it wa the third most populous ( after russia and the german empire ) . the two realm were governed separately by two parliament from two capital city , with a common monarch and common external and military policy . economically , the empire wa a custom union . the old hungarian constitution wa restored , and franz joseph i wa crowned a king of hungary . the era witnessed impressive economic development . the formerly backward hungarian economy became relatively modern and industrialised by the turn of the <number> century , although agriculture remained dominant until <year> . in <year> , the old capital buda and buda were officially united with pest , hungary , thus creating the new metropolis of budapest . many of the state institution and the modern administrative system of hungary were established during this period . </s> after the assassination of archduke franz ferdinand in sarajevo , the hungarian prime minister istvn tisza and his cabinet tried to avoid the outbreak and escalating of a war in europe , but their diplomatic effort were unsuccessful . austriahungary drafted <number> ; million ( fighting force : <number> ; million ) soldier in world war i ( over <number> ; million from the kingdom of hungary ) on the side of germany , bulgaria and turkey . the troop raised in the kingdom of hungary spent little time defending the actual territory of hungary , with the exception of the brusilov offensive in june <year> , and a few month later , when the romanian army made an attack into transylvania , both of which were repelled . in comparison , of the total army , hungary 's loss ratio wa more than any other nation of austria-hungary . the central power conquered serbia . romania declared war . the central power conquered southern romania and the romanian capital bucharest . in <year> emperor franz joseph died , and the new monarch charles iv of hungary sympathized with the pacifist . with great difficulty , the central power stopped and repelled the attack of the russian empire . </s> the eastern front of the allied ( ally of world war i ) power completely collapsed . the austro-hungarian empire then withdrew from all defeated country . on the italian front , the austro-hungarian army made no progress against italy after january <year> . despite great eastern success , germany suffered complete defeat on the more important western front . by <year> , the economic situation had deteriorated ( strike in factory were organised by leftist and pacifist movement ) and uprising in the army had become commonplace . in the capital city , the austrian and hungarian leftist liberal movement ( the maverick party ) and their leader supported the separatism of ethnic minority . austria-hungary signed a general armistice in padua on <number> november <year> . in october <year> , hungary 's union with austria wa dissolved . </s> <section_title_start> between the world war ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> following the first world war , hungary underwent a period of profound political upheaval , beginning with the aster revolution in <year> , which brought the social-democratic mihly krolyi to power a prime minister . the royal hungarian honvd still had more than <number> soldier when mihly krolyi wa announced a prime minister of hungary . krolyi yielded to u.s. president woodrow wilson 's demand for pacifism by ordering the disarmament of the hungarian army . this happened under the direction of bla linder , minister of war in the krolyi government . due to the full disarmament of it army , hungary wa to remain without a national defence at a time of particular vulnerability . during the rule of krolyi 's pacifist cabinet , hungary lost the control over approx . <number> of it former pre-ww1 territory ( <number> <number> ; km ) without fight and wa subject to foreign occupation . the little entente , sensing an opportunity , invaded the country from three sidesromania hungarian-romanian war transylvania , czechoslovakia annexed upper hungary ( today 's slovakia ) , and a joint kingdom of serbia-french army coalition annexed vojvodina and other southern region . in march <year> , communist led by bla kun ousted the krolyi government and proclaimed the hungarian soviet republic ( tancskztrsasg ) , followed by a thorough red terror ( hungary ) campaign . despite some success on the czechoslovak front , kun 's force were ultimately unable to resist the romanian invasion ; by august <year> , romanian troop occupied budapest and ousted kun . </s> in november <year> , rightist force led by former austro-hungarian admiral mikls horthy entered budapest ; exhausted by the war and it aftermath , the populace accepted horthy 's leadership . in january <year> , parliamentary election were held and horthy wa proclaimed regent of the reestablished kingdom of hungary ( <year> <number> ) , inaugurating the so-called `` horthy era `` ( horthy-kor ) . the new government worked quickly to normalize foreign relation while turning a blind eye to a white terror ( hungary ) that swept through the countryside ; extrajudicial killing of suspected communist and jew lasted well into <year> . on <number> june of that year , the treaty of trianon established new border for hungary . the country lost <number> of it territory and <number> of it antebellum population , a well a many source of raw material and it sole port , rijeka . though the revision of the treaty quickly rose to the top of the national political agenda , the horthy government wa not willing to resort to military intervention to do so . </s> the initial year of the horthy regime were preoccupied by putsch attempt by charles iv of hungary , the austro-hungarian pretender ; continued suppression of communist ; and a migration crisis triggered by the trianon territorial change . though free election continued , horthy 's personality , and those of his personally selected prime minister , dominated the political scene . the government 's action continued to drift right with the passage of antisemitic law and , due to the continued isolation of the little entente , economic and then political gravitation towards kingdom of italy # fascist regime ( <year> <number> ) and nazi germany . the great depression further exacerbated the situation and the popularity of fascist politician such a gyula gmbs and ferenc szlasi , promising economic and social recovery , rose . </s> horthy 's nationalist agenda reached it apogee in <year> and <year> , when the nazi rewarded hungary 's staunchly pro-germany foreign policy in the first vienna award and second vienna award , respectively , peacefully restoring ethnic-hungarian-majority area lost after trianon . in <year> , hungary regained further territory from czechoslovakia slovak-hungarian war . hungary tripartite pact the axis power on <number> november <year> , and in <year> , participated in the german invasion of yugoslavia , gaining some of it former territory in the south . </s> <section_title_start> world war ii ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> hungary formally entered world war ii a an axis power on <number> june <year> , declaring war on the soviet union after unidentified plane bombed koice , munkacheve , and rakhiv . hungarian troop fought on the eastern front ( world war ii ) for two year . despite battle of uman , the hungarian government began seeking a secret peace pact with ally ( world war ii ) after the hungarian second army suffered catastrophic loss ostrogozhskrossosh offensive in january <year> . learning of the planned defection , german troop operation margarethe on <number> march <year> to guarantee horthy 's compliance . in october , a the soviet front approached and the hungarian government made further effort to disengage from the war , german troop ousted horthy and installed a puppet government under szlasi 's fascist arrow cross party . szlasi pledged all the country 's capability in service of the german war machine . by october <year> , the soviet had reached the river tisza , and despite battle of debrecen , succeeded in encircling and battle of budapest in december . </s> after german occupation , hungary holocaust in hungary in the holocaust . during the german occupation in mayjune <year> , the arrow cross and hungarian police deported nearly <number> jew , mainly to auschwitz concentration camp . nearly all of them were murdered . the swedish diplomat raoul wallenberg managed to save a considerable number of hungarian jew by giving them swedish passport . rezs kasztner , one of the leader of the hungarian aid and rescue committee , bribed senior s officer such a adolf eichmann to allow some jew to escape . the horthy government 's complicity in the holocaust remains a point of controversy and contention . </s> the war left hungary devastated , destroying over <number> of the economy and causing significant world war ii casualty # endnote hungary . in addition to the over <number> hungarian jew killed , a many a <number> other hungarian were raped , murdered and executed or deported for slave labour by czechoslovak , soviet red army troop , and yugoslav . </s> on <number> february <year> , budapest surrendered ; by april , german troop left the country under soviet military occupation . <number> hungarian were expelled from czechoslovakia in exchange for <number> slovak living in hungary . <number> ethnic german were expelled to germany , and through the <year> paris peace treaty , hungary wa again reduced to it immediate post-trianon border . </s> <section_title_start> communism ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> following the defeat of nazi germany , hungary became a soviet satellite of the soviet union . the soviet leadership selected mtys rkosi to front the stalinization of the country , and rkosi de facto ruled hungary from <year> to <year> . his government 's policy of militarization , industrialisation , collectivization , and war compensation led to a severe decline in living standard . in imitation of stalin 's kgb , the rkosi government established a secret political police , the state protection authority , to enforce the new regime . in the ensuing purge approximately <number> official and intellectual were imprisoned or executed from <year> to <year> . many freethinker , democrat , and horthy-era dignitary were secretly arrested and extrajudicially interned in domestic and foreign gulag . some <number> hungarian were deported to soviet labour camp , where at least <number> died . </s> after stalin 's death in <year> , the soviet union pursued a programme of destalinization that wa inimical to rkosi , leading to his deposition . the following political cooling saw the ascent of imre nagy to the premiership , and the growing interest of student and intellectual in political life . nagy promised market liberalization and political openness , while rkosi opposed both vigorously . rkosi eventually managed to discredit nagy and replace him with the more hard-line ern ger . hungary joined the warsaw pact in may <year> , a societal dissatisfaction with the regime swelled . following the firing on peaceful demonstration by soviet soldier and secret police , and rally throughout the country on <number> october <year> , protester took to the street in budapest , initiating the hungarian revolution of <year> . in an effort to quell the chaos , nagy returned a premier , promised free election , and took hungary out of the warsaw pact . </s> the violence nonetheless continued a revolutionary militia sprung up against the soviet army and the vh ; the roughly <number>-strong resistance fought soviet tank using molotov cocktail and machine-pistols . though the preponderance of the soviet wa immense , they suffered heavy loss , and by <number> october <year> , most soviet troop had withdrawn from budapest to garrison the countryside . for a time , the soviet leadership wa unsure how to respond to development in hungary but eventually decided to intervene to prevent a destabilization of the soviet bloc . on <number> november , reinforcement of more than <number> troop and <number> tank entered the country from the soviet union . nearly <number> hungarian were killed resisting the intervention , while an additional <number> were imprisoned afterwards for political reason . some <number> were interned and <number> brought to trial and executed . nagy wa secretly tried , found guilty , sentenced to death and executed by hanging in june <year> . because border were briefly opened , nearly a quarter of a million people fled the country by the time the revolution wa suppressed . </s> <section_title_start> kdr era ( <year> <number> ) <section_title_end> </s> after a second , briefer period of soviet military occupation , jnos kdr , nagy 's former minister of state , wa chosen by the soviet leadership to head the new government and chair the new ruling hungarian socialist worker ' party socialist worker ' party ( mszmp ) . kdr quickly normalized the situation . in <year> , the government granted a general amnesty and released the majority of those imprisoned for their active participation in the uprising . kdr proclaimed a new policy line , according to which the people were no longer compelled to profess loyalty to the party if they tacitly accepted the socialist regime a a fact of life . in many speech , he described this a , `` those who are not against u are with u . `` kdr introduced new planning priority in the economy , such a allowing farmer significant plot of private land within the collective farm system ( hztji gazdlkods ) . the living standard rose a consumer good and food production took precedence over military production , which wa reduced to one-tenth of pre-revolutionary level . </s> in <year> , the new economic mechanism ( nem ) introduced free-market element into socialist command economy . from the <year> through the late <year> , hungary wa often referred to a `` the happiest barrack `` within the eastern bloc . during the latter part of the cold war hungary 's gdp per caput wa fourth only to east germany , czechoslovak socialist republic , and the soviet union itself . a a result of this relatively high standard of living , a more liberalized economy , a le censored press , and le restricted travel right , hungary wa generally considered one of the more liberal country in which to live in central europe during communism . in the <year> , however , living standard steeply declined again due to early <year> recession to which communism wa unable to respond . by the time kdr died in <year> , the soviet union wa in steep decline and a younger generation of reformist saw liberalization a the solution to economic and social issue . </s> <section_title_start> third republic ( <year> present ) <section_title_end> </s> hungary 's fall of communism to democracy and capitalism ( rendszervlts , `` regime change `` ) wa peaceful and prompted by economic stagnation , domestic political pressure , and changing relation with other warsaw pact country . although the mszmp began hungarian round table talk with various opposition group in march <year> , the reburial of imre nagy a a revolutionary martyr that june is widely considered the symbolic end of communism in hungary . over <number> people attended the budapest ceremony without any significant government interference , and many speaker openly called for soviet troop to leave the country . free election were held <year> hungarian parliamentary election , and the hungarian democratic forum , a major conservative opposition group , wa elected to the head of a coalition government . jzsef antall became the first democratically elected prime minister since world war ii . </s> with the removal of state subsidy and rapid privatization in <year> , hungary wa affected by a severe economic recession . the antall government 's austerity measure proved unpopular , and the communist party 's legal and political heir , the hungarian socialist party , won the subsequent <year> hungarian parliamentary election . this abrupt shift in the political landscape wa repeated in <year> hungarian parliamentary election and <year> hungarian parliamentary election ; each electoral cycle , the governing party wa ousted and the erstwhile opposition elected . like most other post-communist european state , however , hungary broadly pursued an european integration agenda , enlargement of nato nato in <year> and the european union <year> hungarian european union membership referendum . a a nato member , hungary wa involved in the yugoslav war . </s> in <year> , <year> protest in hungary erupted after it wa revealed that prime minister ferenc gyurcsny had claimed in szd speech that hungarian socialist party `` lied `` to win the <year> hungarian parliamentary election . the popularity of left-wing party plummeted in the ensuing political upheaval , and in <year> , viktor orbn 's national conservatism national-conservative fidesz wa <year> hungarian parliamentary election to a parliamentary supermajority . the legislature consequently approved a constitution of hungary , among other sweeping governmental and legal change . although these development were met with and still engender controversy , fidesz secured a second parliamentary supermajority <year> hungarian parliamentary election and a third <year> hungarian parliamentary election . </s> in september <year> , the european parliament voted to act against hungary , under the term of article <number> of the treaty on european union . proponent of the vote claimed that the hungarian government posed a democratic backsliding `` systematic threat `` to democracy and the rule of law . the vote wa carried with the support of <number> meps , narrowly clearing the two-thirds majority required . the vote marked the first the european parliament had triggered an article <number> procedure against an eu member state . pter szijjrt , the minister of foreign affair ( hungary ) , described the vote a `` petty revenge `` which had been provoked by hungary 's tough anti-migration policy . szijjrt alleged that the vote wa fraudulent because abstention were not counted which made it easier to reach the two-thirds majority required to pas the vote . </s> at the european election in may <year> , viktor orbn 's fidesz party secured another a sweeping victory , receiving more than <number> of the vote . </s> in march <year> , during the ongoing covid-19 pandemic in hungary , the hungarian parliament passed a law granting the government the power to rule by decree to the extent it is necessary to diminish the consequence of the pandemic , suspending by-election and outlawing the `` spreading of misinformation `` . the government 's special authorisation is in force until the pandemic is declared to have ended . the law wa lifted on <number> june <year> . </s> <section_title_start> geography <section_title_end> </s> hungary 's geography ha traditionally been defined by it two main waterway , the danube and tisza river . the common tripartite division of the country into three sectionsdunntl ( `` beyond the danube `` , transdanubia ) , tiszntl ( `` beyond the tisza `` ) , and duna-tisza kze ( `` between the danube and tisza `` ) is a reflection of this . the danube flow northsouth right through the centre of contemporary hungary , and the entire country lie within it drainage basin . </s> transdanubia , which stretch westward from the centre of the country towards austria , is a primarily hilly region with a terrain varied by low mountain . these include the very eastern stretch of the alp , alpokalja , in the west of the country , the transdanubian mountain in the central region of transdanubia , and the mecsek mountain and villny mountain in the south . the highest point of the area is the rott-k in the alp , at . the little hungarian plain ( kisalfld ) is found in northern transdanubia . lake balaton and lake hvz , the largest lake in central europe and the largest thermal lake in the world , respectively , are in transdanubia a well . </s> the duna-tisza kze and tiszntl are characterised mainly by the great hungarian plain ( alfld ) , which stretch across most of the eastern and southeastern area of the country . to the north of the plain are the foothill of the carpathian mountain in a wide band near the slovakian border . the kkes at is the tallest mountain in hungary and is found here . </s> phytogeography , hungary belongs to the central european province of the circumboreal region within the boreal kingdom . according to the world wide fund for nature , the territory of hungary belongs to the terrestrial ecoregion of pannonian mixed forest . it had a <year> forest landscape integrity index mean score of <number>/10 , ranking it <number> globally out of <number> country . </s> hungary ha <number> national park , <number> minor nature reserve , and <number> landscape protection area . </s> hungary is a landlocked country . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> hungary ha a temperate climate , with generally warm summer with low overall humidity level but frequent rainshowers and cold snowy winter . average annual temperature is . temperature extreme are on <number> july <year> at kiskunhalas in the summer and on <number> february <year> miskolc-grmblytapolca in the winter . average high temperature in the summer is and average low temperature in the winter is . the average yearly rainfall is approximately . </s> hungary is ranked sixth in an environmental protection index by gw/climate action network . </s> <section_title_start> government and politics <section_title_end> </s> hungary is a unitary state , parliamentary democratic , representative democracy parliamentary republic . the hungarian political system operates under a framework reformed in <year> ; this constitutional document is the constitution of hungary . amendment generally require a two-thirds majority of parliament ; the fundamental principle of the constitution ( a expressed in the article guaranteeing human dignity , the separation of power , the state structure , and the rule of law ) are valid in perpetuity . <number> member of parliament ( orszggylsi kpvisel ) are elected to the highest organ of state authority , the unicameralism national assembly of hungary ( national assembly ) , every four year in a single-round first-past-the-post voting first-past-the-post election with an election threshold of <number> . </s> the president of hungary ( kztrsasgi elnk ) serf a the [ of state ] and is elected by the national assembly every five year . the president is invested primarily with representative responsibility and power : receiving foreign head of state , formally nominating the prime minister at the recommendation of the national assembly , and serving a commander-in-chief of the hungarian army . importantly , the president is also invested with veto power , and may send legislation to the <number>-member constitutional court of hungary for review . the third most-significant governmental position in hungary is the list of speaker of the national assembly ( hungary ) , who is elected by the national assembly and responsible for overseeing the daily session of the body . </s> the prime minister of hungary ( miniszterelnk ) is elected by the national assembly , serving a the [ of government ] and exercising executive ( government ) . traditionally , the prime minister is the leader of the largest party in parliament . the prime minister selects government of hungary minister and ha the exclusive right to dismiss them , although cabinet nominee must appear before consultative open hearing before one or more parliamentary committee , survive a vote in the national assembly , and be formally approved by the president . the cabinet report to national assembly ( hungary ) . </s> in <year> hungary , due to strong economic difficulty , had to request the help of the imf for about <number> ; billion . the debt-to-gdp ratio of hungary had it peak in <year> when it stood at <number> and decreased since then . according to eurostat , the government debt of hungary amount to <number> ; billion huf or <number> of it gross domestic product in <year> . the government achieved a budget deficit <number> of the gdp in <year> . hungary 's credit rating by credit rating agency standard & poor 's , moody 's and fitch rating stand at investment grade bbb with a stable outlook in <year> . </s> on transparency international 's <year> corruption perception index hungary 's public sector ha deteriorated from a score of <number> in <year> to <number> in <year> making it the <number> most corrupt eu member at pair with romania and behind bulgaria . </s> following a decade of fidesz-kdnp rule lead by viktor orbn , freedom house 's nation in transit <year> report reclassified hungary from a democracy to a transitional or [ regime ] . according to the report , `` the right-wing alliance ... ha gradually undermined the rule of law in hungary and established tight control over the country s independent institution ... [ it ] ha steadily rewritten the hungarian constitution , and eliminated democratic safeguard statutorily embodied in the constitutional court , prosecutor office , medium authority , and state audit office ... `` . it also limited parliamentary oversight , independent news medium , non-governmental organization and academic freedom , while consolidating power around the central government . </s> <section_title_start> political party <section_title_end> </s> since the fall of communism , hungary ha a multi-party system . the <year> hungarian parliamentary election took place on <number> april <year> . this parliamentary election wa the <number> since the <year> hungarian parliamentary election <year> first multi-party election . the result wa a victory for fideszchristian democratic people 's party ( hungary ) alliance , preserving it two-thirds majority with viktor orbn remaining prime minister . it wa the second election according to the new constitution of hungary which went into force on <number> january <year> . the new electoral law also entered into force that day . the voter elected <number> mp instead of previous <number> lawmaker . the current political landscape in hungary is dominated by the conservative fidesz , who have a near supermajority , and two medium-sized party , the left-wing democratic coalition ( hungary ) ( dk ) and liberal momentum movement . </s> the democratic character of the hungarian parliament wa reestablished with revolution of <year> and the end of communist dictatorship in <year> . today 's parliament is still called orszggyls just like in royal time , but in order to differentiate between the historical royal diet is referred to a `` national assembly `` now . the diet of hungary wa a legislative institution in the kingdom of hungary in the middle age from the <year> , and in it successor state , royal hungary and the land of the crown of saint stephen throughout the early modern period . the article of the <year> diet set out that the diet should meet at least once every <number> year , but , since the diet wa called by the habsburg monarchy , this promise wa not kept on several occasion thereafter . a a result of the austro-hungarian compromise of <year> austro-hungarian compromise , it wa reconstituted in <year> . the latin term natio hungarica ( `` hungarian nation `` ) wa used to designate the political elite which had participation in the diet , consisting of the hungarian nobility , the catholic clergy , and a few enfranchised burgher , regardless of language or ethnicity . </s> <section_title_start> law and judicial system <section_title_end> </s> the judicial system of hungary is a civil law ( legal system ) system divided between court with regular civil and criminal jurisdiction and administrative court with jurisdiction over litigation between individual and the public administration . hungarian law is codified and based on law of germany and in a wider sense , civil law or roman law . the court system for civil and criminal jurisdiction consists of local court ( jrsbrsg ) , regional appellate court ( tltbla ) , and the supreme court ( kria ) . hungary 's highest court are located in budapest . </s> law enforcement in hungary is split among the rendrsg and the national tax and custom administration . the hungarian police is the main and largest state law enforcement agency in hungary . it carry nearly all general police duty such a criminal investigation , patrol activity , traffic policing , border control . it is led by the national police commissioner under the control of the ministry of interior ( hungary ) . the body is divided into county police department which are also divided into regional and town police department . the national police also have subordinate agency with nationwide jurisdiction , such a the `` nemzeti nyomoz iroda `` ( national bureau of investigation ) , a civilian police force specialised in investigating serious crime , and the gendarmerie-like , militarised `` kszenlti rendrsg `` ( stand-by police ) mainly dealing with riot and often reinforcing local police force . due to hungary 's accession to the schengen treaty , the police and border guard were merged into a single national corp , with the border guard becoming police officer . this merger took place in january <year> . the custom and excise authority remained subject to the ministry of finance under the national tax and custom administration . </s> <section_title_start> administrative division <section_title_end> </s> hungary is a unitary state divided into <number> county of hungary ( megye ) . in addition , the capital of hungary ( fvros ) , budapest , is an independent entity . the county and the capital are the <number> nomenclature of territorial unit for statistic third-level unit of hungary . the state are further subdivided into <number> district of hungary ( jr ) . the district are further divided into list of city and town of hungary , of which <number> are designated town with county right ( megyei jog vros ) , sometimes known a `` urban county `` in english . the local authority of these town have extended power , but these town belong to the territory of the respective district instead of being independent territorial unit . county and district council and municipality have different role and separate responsibility relating to local government . the role of the county are basically administrative and focus on strategic development , while preschool , public water utility , garbage disposal , elderly care and rescue service are administered by the municipality . </s> since <year> , the county and city of budapest have been grouped into seven region of hungary for statistical and development purpose . these seven region constitute nomenclature of territorial unit for statistic ' second-level unit of hungary . they are central hungary , central transdanubia , northern great plain , northern hungary , southern transdanubia , southern great plain , and western transdanubia . </s> <section_title_start> foreign relation <section_title_end> </s> the foreign policy of hungary is based on four basic commitment : to atlanticism atlantic co-operation , to european integration , to international development and to international law . the economy of hungary is fairly open and relies strongly on international trade . </s> hungary ha been a member of the united nation since december <year> and a member of the european union , nato , the organisation for economic co-operation and development , the visegrd group , the wto , the world bank , the asian infrastructure investment bank and the international monetary fund . hungary took on the presidency of the council of the european union for half a year in <year> and the next will be in <year> . in <year> , hungary wa the fifth largest oecd non-dac donor of development aid in the world , which represents list of development aid country donor <number> of it gross national income . </s> hungary 's capital city , budapest , is home to more than <number> embassy and representative body a an international political actor . hungary host the main and regional headquarters of many international organisation a well , including european institute of innovation and technology , european police college , united nation high commissioner for refugee , food and agriculture organization of the united nation , international centre for democratic transition , institute of international education , international labour organization , international organization for migration , international federation of red cross and red crescent society , regional environmental center for central and eastern europe , danube commission ( <year> ) and others . </s> since <year> , hungary 's top foreign policy goal ha been achieving integration into western economic and security organisation . hungary joined the partnership for peace programme in <year> and ha actively supported the ifor and sfor mission in bosnia . hungary since <year> ha also improved it often frosty neighbourly relation by signing basic treaty with romania , slovakia , and ukraine . these renounce all outstanding territorial claim and lay the foundation for constructive relation . however , the issue of hungarian diaspora right in romania , slovakia and serbia periodically cause bilateral tension to flare up . since <year> , the hungaryukraine relation rapidly deteriorated over the issue of the hungarian in ukraine . hungary overall innovation efficiency ratio in the world . </s> the key actor of research and development in hungary is the national research , development and innovation office ( nrdi office ) , which is a national strategic and funding of science funding agency for scientific research , development and innovation , the primary source of advice on rdi policy for the government of hungary , and the primary rdi funding agency . it role is to develop rdi policy and ensure that hungary adequately invest in rdi by funding excellent research and supporting innovation to increase competitiveness and to prepare the rdi strategy of the hungarian government , to handle the national research , development and innovation fund , and represents the hungarian government and a hungarian rdi community in international organisation . </s> scientific research in the country is supported partly by industry and partly by the state , through the list of university in hungary and by scientific state-institutions such a hungarian academy of science . hungary ha been the home of some of the most prominent researcher in various scientific discipline , notably physic , mathematics , chemistry and engineering . a of <year> , list of hungarian nobel laureate have been recipient of a nobel prize . until <year> three individual : csoma , jnos bolyai and tihanyi were included in the unesco memory of the world register a well a the collective contribution : tabula hungariae and bibliotheca corviniana . contemporary , internationally well-known hungarian scientist include : mathematician lszl lovsz , physicist albert-lszl barabsi , physicist ferenc krausz , and biochemist rpd pusztai . hungary is famous for it excellent mathematics education which ha trained numerous outstanding scientist . famous hungarian mathematician include father farkas bolyai and son jnos bolyai , who wa one of the founder of non-euclidean geometry ; paul erds , famed for publishing in over forty language and whose erds number are still tracked , and john von neumann , a key contributor in the field of quantum mechanic and game theory , a pioneer of digital computing , and the chief mathematician in the manhattan project . notable hungarian invention include the lead dioxide match ( jnos irinyi ) , a type of carburetor ( dont bnki , jnos csonka ) , the electric ( ac ) train engine and generator ( klmn kand ) , [ ( dennis gabor ] ) , the [ [ kalman filter ( rudolf e. klmn ) , and rubik 's cube ( ern rubik ) . </s> <section_title_start> transport <section_title_end> </s> hungary ha a highly developed road , railway , air and water transport system . budapest , the capital , serf a an important hub for the hungarian state railway ( mv ) . the capital is served by three large train station called eastern railway station ( budapest ) ( eastern ) , western railway station ( budapest ) ( western ) , and southern railway station ( budapest ) ( southern ) plyaudvars . szolnok is the most important railway hub outside budapest , while tiszai railway station in miskolc and the main station of szombathely , gyr , szeged , and szkesfehrvr are also key to the network . </s> budapest , debrecen , miskolc , and szeged have tram network . the budapest metro is the second-oldest underground rapid transit system in the world ; it line <number> ( budapest metro ) date from <year> . the system consists of four line . a regional rail system , hv , operates in the budapest metropolitan area . </s> hungary ha a total length of approximately motorway ( autplya ) . motorway section are being added to the existing network , which already connects many major economically important city to the capital . </s> the most important port is budapest . other important one include dunajvros and baja , hungary . </s> there are five international airport in hungary : budapest liszt ferenc international airport ( informally called `` ferihegy `` after it previous name ) , debrecen international airport , srmellk international airport ( also called hvz-balaton airport ) , gyr-pr international airport gyr-pr , and pcs-pogny international airport pcs-pogny . the national <number> locality a of july <number> , <year> . <number> town ( hungarian term : vros , plural : vrosok ; the terminology doe n't distinguish between city and town the term town is used in official
